body: LEAD: For Hanukkah, Apple Wine For Hanukkah, Apple Wine Traditionally potato pancakes, or latkes, are served with applesauce for Hanukkah. This year, consider serving apple wine as well. Joseph Cerniglia Winery in Cavendish, Vt., has been making varietal fruit wines for several years. This year the wines carry a seal indicating they are kosher.

title: Youth Admits Burning Synagogue; Term of Weekends in Jail Planned
